header_text: You are at your child’s wedding. They ask you to dance with them, but you are reluctant because you feel unsteady on your feet. Whether or not your child notices, you know that you are a good parent.

elements.Text: Will your presence on the dance floor be appreciated?

elements.name: You are at your child’s wedding. They ask you to dance with them, but you are reluctant because you feel unsteady on your feet. Whether or not your child notices, you know that you are a good parent._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
